testcase.classname: user should be able to register on the system
testcase.name: user Register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to Register URL..............................................passed When user enter "female" and "Reham" and "Ibrahim" and "5" and "2" and "2016" and "test2@gmail.com" and "123456" and "123456".passed And enter on Register button................................................passed Then user could Register successfully.......................................passed And user click on Continue button...........................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with valid email and password
Guest change currency from US-Dollar to Euro
testcase.system-out: Given Click on currency dropdown............................................passed Then select Euro from currency..............................................passed

testcase.classname: guest could able to click on two Sliders on Homepage
testcase.name: Click on Iphone Slider
testcase.failure:
